name: Qwerty, the cat
description:
At home, my cat, Qwerty, uses my things to play and leaves them hidden everywhere. Can you help me find them? How to play: Just click the scenes to zoom in, and find the stuff the cat hid.

-----

Game made at Global Game Jam 2019 - Buenos Aires, Argentina
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/qwerty-cat
